Additional Readings

  • ‘The Metaphysics of Time’, Bradley Dowden
    • Ch.8 is optional for week 12
    • Ch.4 is optional for week 13
  • ‘Material Constitution’, Michael Rea from Metaphysics: the Basics
  • ‘Of Confused Subjects Which Are Equivalent to Two Subjects:. An Excerpt from The Port-Royal Logic’, Antoine Arnauld and Pierre Nicole
  • ‘Identity, Ostension, and Hypostasis’, W. V. O. Quine, pp. 621–624
  • ‘Free Will’, Lewis Vaughn
  • ‘A Geography of Time’, Robert Levine
  • ‘Aristotle on Time’, Tony Roark
  • ‘Time, Work-Discipline, and Industrial Capitalism,’ E.P. Thompson
  • ‘The Mystery of Time’, O.K. Bouwsma
  • ‘Time Without Change,’ Sydney Shoemaker
  • ‘Slaughterhouse-Five,’ Kurt Vonnegut
  • ‘The Paradoxes of Motion and the Impossibility of Change,’ E.J. Lowe
  • ‘All You Zombies,’ by Robert Heinlein
  • ‘The Paradoxes of Time Travel’, David Lewis
